head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths GODSIL, RICHARD J.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths GODSIL, RICHARD J.

block.p: GODSIL--Richard J., of Bayside, on April 9, 2007. Beloved husband of Theresa (nee Sullivan). Loving father of Richard, Nora, and Kathleen. Cherished grandfather of two. Reposing at Lloyd Funeral Home, 39th Ave. at 215 Street, Thursday, 2-5 and 7-9pm. Mass of Christian Burial, Friday, 9:45am. Our Lady of the Blessed Sacrament R.C. Church, Bayside.
